title: Maine Technology Institute (MTI)
description: MTI provides funding and business support to Maine-based technology companies. They offer various programs including seed grants, development loans, and cluster enhancement awards. Perfect for tech startups looking to commercialize their innovations.

title: CEI Investment Notes
description: Coastal Enterprises Inc. provides patient capital and technical assistance to businesses that create economic opportunity in Maine's underinvested markets. They focus on companies that create quality jobs and strengthen communities.

title: Top Gun Ventures
description: Top Gun Ventures is a venture capital firm focused on investing in scalable technology companies. They provide both capital and strategic guidance to help companies achieve rapid growth and market leadership.

title: Maine SBIR/STTR Program
description: Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs provide funding for research and development projects with commercial potential. Maine has strong support infrastructure for these federal programs.

title: Maine Venture Fund (MVF)
description: Maine Venture Fund invests in Maine-based companies with high-growth potential, providing equity capital to support their expansion.

title: North Atlantic Capital
description: North Atlantic Capital provides growth capital to later-stage technology companies.

title: Maine Angels
description: Maine Angels is a group of accredited investors who provide funding and mentorship to early-stage companies in Maine and New England.

title: Dirigo Labs
description: Dirigo Labs is a startup accelerator that provides mentorship, resources, and funding opportunities to early-stage companies in Maine.

title: Roux Institute Founder Residency
description: The Roux Institute's Founder Residency program offers mentorship, resources, and a supportive community for early-stage technology companies.

title: Tom's of Maine Incubator
description: The Tom's of Maine Incubator provides funding, mentorship, and support to young entrepreneurs working on solutions to environmental and social challenges.

title: Finance Authority of Maine (FAME)
description: The Finance Authority of Maine (FAME) provides a wide range of financial solutions to help Maine businesses start, grow, and succeed.

title: Northern Maine Development Commission (NMDC)
description: The Northern Maine Development Commission offers a range of business development services, including financing and technical assistance, to support economic growth in the region.
